title: The Haunting of Hill House
author: Shirley Jackson
description: Experience the chilling and mysterious events at the haunted Hill House.

title: IT
author: Stephen King
description: Encounter the terror of Pennywise the Dancing Clown in the small town of Derry.

title: Bird Box
author: Josh Malerman
description: Survive the unknown horrors that drive people to madness when seen.

title: The Shining
author: Stephen King
description: Witness the supernatural events at the haunted Overlook Hotel.

title: Psycho
author: Robert Bloch
description: Delve into the mind of the disturbed Norman Bates in this psychological horror classic.

title: House of Leaves
author: Mark Z. Danielewski
description: Experience the unsettling journey through a labyrinthine house that defies the laws of physics.

title: Dracula
author: Bram Stoker
description: Enter the world of the iconic vampire Count Dracula in this Gothic horror classic.

title: Coraline
author: Neil Gaiman
description: Embark on a dark and fantastical journey with Coraline into the mysterious Other World.

title: American Psycho
author: Bret Easton Ellis
description: Explore the disturbing and graphic world of Patrick Bateman in this psychological horror novel.
